Posts.Content: sydbug wrote: Hi.  My sister was diagnosed in 2007 with b.c. with HER2+ and +nodes.  After chemo they took the nodes and part of her breast, did lots of radiation and 1 year on herceptin.  Fast forward to April 23 of this year and she had a seizure, of course, brain mets!  Surgery went well and she just finished 15 doses of whole brain radiation.  Went to the Dr. (onoc) yesterday and they are putting her on Tykerb in a month.  She had a whole body scan and the cancer is nowhere else.  What scares me is that my mom had b.c. and then 6 years later met's to the brain.  Seems like my sis is going down the same path.  Mom died in 2007 while sis was in the middle of chemo!  My sis is 45 and I'm 40.  They talked about gene testing us.  Just waiting for the appointment.  I really don't know what to do!  I'm freaking out for my sis and for myself!  Does anyone have some words for me?  What can I say to her to make her feel better and to live life and not be negative!  Is it possible that the cancer will never come back?  Julie Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: New here and I have questions... sydbug saint
